<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a> ^ (Hasher(Val) + 2654435769 + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a> &lt;&lt; 6) + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a> &gt;&gt; 2));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Ret = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DIL = DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt(); DIL; DIL = DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret = hashCombine(Ret, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23db35042db15bf83edbd2250ea0ee90">xxh3&#95;64bits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a>(DIL-&gt;getLine())));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Ret = hashCombine(Ret, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23db35042db15bf83edbd2250ea0ee90">xxh3&#95;64bits</a>(DIL-&gt;getSubprogramLinkageName()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ret;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Traverse the CFG and assign FD discriminators. If two instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have the same lineno and discriminator, but residing in different BBs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the latter instruction will get a new discriminator value. The new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// discriminator keeps the existing discriminator value but sets new bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// b/w LowBit and HighBit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MIRAddFSDiscriminators::runOnMachineFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61cf315897c96016607a2b8d5916a64d">EnableFSDiscriminator</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasPseudoProbe = MF.getFunction().getParent()-&gt;getNamedMetadata(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afe8cddc1b878bbfc7598e672f96cfbf1">PseudoProbeDescMetadataName</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasPseudoProbe &amp;&amp; !MF.getFunction().shouldEmitDebugInfoForProfiling())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask of discriminators before this pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO(xur): simplify this once we switch to ImprovedFSDiscriminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LowBitTemp = LowBit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LowBit &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;LowBit in FSDiscriminator cannot be 0&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90b03a5ed7ead5551ff645caf7804633">ImprovedFSDiscriminator</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LowBitTemp -= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitMaskBefore = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa860d116fc20fde892f7485b706f9139">getN1Bits</a>(LowBitTemp);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask of discriminators including this pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitMaskNow = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa860d116fc20fde892f7485b706f9139">getN1Bits</a>(HighBit);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask of discriminators for bits specific to this pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BitMaskThisPass = BitMaskNow ^ BitMaskBefore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumNewD = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MIRAddFSDiscriminators working on Func: &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasPseudoProbe) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Only assign discriminators to pseudo probe instructions. Call</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isPseudoProbe())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90b03a5ed7ead5551ff645caf7804633">ImprovedFSDiscriminator</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isMetaInstruction()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DILocation &#42;DIL = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getDebugLoc().get();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DIL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the id of pseudo probe to compute the discriminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LineNo =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LineNo == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clean up discriminators for pseudo probes at the first FS discriminator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pass as their discriminators should not ever be used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Pass == FSDiscriminatorPass::Pass1) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isPseudoProbe()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewDIL = DIL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation/#ab7345daa994ad45abb206b757dda7f22">cloneWithDiscriminator</a>(NewD);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Could not encode discriminator: &quot;</span></CodeLine>
